1093668681349877761.text: I've done a lot of work over the years with folks dealing with non-consensual intimate images (NCII aka "revenge porn") and it's a bit heartening to see someone with a lot of power just flip the bird at folks targeting him that way. I wish everyone I worked with had that option.

1093666634596704256.text: "The Gift of Fear" is an imperfect book - the section on domestic violence hasn't aged well & is victim-blamey - but its overall principles of recognizing the indicators of future violence and being willing to throw a shit-fit to prevent it remain super valid and important.

1093665653460877312.text: Bezos's response is actually a textbook example of how to respond to extortion. His consultant, Gavin de Becker, literally did write the textbook - here's the section on extortion from his book "The Gift of Fear":pic.twitter.com/Wt7JDNhBCl

1093662811526320128.text: There's a saying that you can't buy silence, you can only rent it. The only way to respond to extortion that lead to it escalating it is to show that you don't give a fuck, and the Bezos post does a good job of that.
